Text:
Wow, 80z You've surpassed Yourself once again. What a stunning albums compilation. I-Ten are so creative, their songs have been covered so many times with great success (by Heart, REO Speedwaggon...), yet they are almost unknown.
Body Electric are a great Vancouver band, but do You, by any chance, possess their 2nd album Walking Through Glass (1987)? Do You possess also Vancouver gems like Idle Eyes' albums Love's Imperfection (1986) and Standing at the Edge (1988)? Also, as far as Canadian bands are conserned, I wonder if You have Age of Mirrors - Screenplay (1987).
Thanks again.
Cheers.

Hi r.trifun, I have got Walking Through Glass on LP I think. I will rip and post it when I get to it. I am sure I have already posted both Idle Eyes records on previous installments, just don't know which one. Cheers
Thankyou 80z. I watch in anticipation and then you deliver 2 tomes in double quick time. I don't know how you do it, but I'm glad you do. Well done. Cheers. T.
great collection of rare albums..........gud wrk
